text: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. W10 Pro 22H2 personal device after October updates Search box not present on Taskbar. Taskbar/Search option only configured to show Search icon. Taskbar Settings/Taskbar items – no toggle switch item for Search. People and News and Interest items both have toggle switch(and unchanged, both still Off) %40BYAPR05MB6552.namprd05.prod.outlook.com
